welcome_message_body: Welcome to Bekasi, Indonesia! Known for its vibrant culture, delicious cuisine, and friendly people, we invite you to explore our charming city and all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories here in Bekasi.

restaurants.name: Bekasi Food City
restaurants.description: Bekasi Food City is a indonesian restaurant located in Bekasi.
restaurants.address: Summarecon Mal Bekasi (Jl. Bulevard Ahmad Yani Blok M), Bekasi, Jawa Barat

restaurants.name: Sate Khas Senayan
restaurants.description: Sate Khas Senayan is a indonesian restaurant located in Bekasi.
restaurants.address: Summarecon Mal Bekasi, Downtown Walk (Jl. Boulevard Ahmad Yani Blok M), Bekasi, Jawa Barat 17142

restaurants.name: Food Temptation
restaurants.description: Food Temptation is a food court located in Bekasi.
restaurants.address: Summarecon Mal Bekasi, Lt. 3 (Jl. Bulevard Ahmad Yani Blok M), Bekasi, Jawa Barat 17142

restaurants.name: Sushi Tei
restaurants.description: Sushi Tei is a sushi restaurant located in Bekasi.
restaurants.address: Summarecon Mal Bekasi GF, Jalan Bulevard Ahmad Yani Blok M, Bekasi, Jawa Barat 17142

restaurants.name: Marugame Udon
restaurants.description: Marugame Udon is a udon restaurant located in Bekasi.
restaurants.address: Summarecon Mal Bekasi (Jalan Bulevard Ahmad Yani Blok M), Bekasi, Jawa Barat

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Soekarno-Hatta International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The second largest terminal at Soekarno-Hatta International Airport, serving mainly domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest and most modern terminal at Soekarno-Hatta International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout all terminals.
